screensaver.name: xaos
screensaver._description:
XaoS generates fast fly-through animations of the Mandelbrot and other fractal sets. This is not included with the XScreenSaver package, but if you don't have it already, you can find it at <http://wmi.math.u-szeged.hu/~kovzol/xaos/doku.php>.
Written by Thomas Marsh and Jan Hubicka.
